Veratis walked over to the protoform and touched it's arm. "Can youy 
feal my hand? he asked wondering just what extent the protoform had 
developed. "Can you feal pain, cold, hot?" he didn't really expect a 
response from her he was asking the questions more to himself than 
anything. He picked out a needle "This may hurt a little." he told 
her as he jabbed the needle into the Protoforms arm extracting a 
sample of the protoplasm from the body.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She moved the bot back to it's resting position on the table.  It 
lay 
> there while she tried a new connection to it's optics.  She went 
> through the optic connections from where she was up through the 
> central brain stem and routed through the cranial connections to 
the 
> optics.  This time, it started to work.  She could see, like 
looking 
> through extremely blurry bionoculars.  She found the small 
connection 
> to the vocal box inside the protoform's throat.  She tried to make 
it 
> speak, but only a few squeeks and some hushed  muttering came out.  
> It was going to take time to get the voice to work, but she had 
> nothing but time on her hands as far as she was concerned.
